effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,043 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 2.7 million Fire damage to your primary target and 220,934 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 32,995 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 98,987 Nature Damage instead.
Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
